tool_description: Scrapper for the last culture news from all over the World.
name: Culture News Web Scrapper
title: Culture News Web Scrapper

api_list.name: News from single media resource
api_list.description: Get all culture news from the single media resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://culture-news-web-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes_ny"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "culture-news-web-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
